website_summaries.verdict: Mid-priced option that's an ideal size for smaller spaces.
pros: It's a perfect size for balconies or decks
Included trimmings bag is removable and keeps things tidy
cons: The trimmings bag can be a challenge to attach securely

customer_reviews.title: Price is great and shouldn't be a deterrent to making
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect for such a low price but it was crazy easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I have a very large bag of potting soil sitting on the bottom shelf and there's no sagging or bending in the wire shelf. I like the wood slats they allow planters to sit securely without fear of tipping while filling with soil.
customer_reviews.author: Grace D.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't pay 20 dollars for this if I had seen it in person. Screw attachment fell off, so one leg impossible to attach, top won't stay on even when screws are tightened, not trustworthy, was going to put plants and small grill on top but not safe. Got a message that seller has to "approve" the return? Since when? No desire to keep a bad product. So disappointed. Seems that lately I am having to return a number of flimsy products that Amazon is sponsoring, what's going on? Have had great products up until recently, all through the quarantining.
customer_reviews.author: GC0

customer_reviews.title: This has been perfect. The size fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a table to use on my narrow deck, next to the grill. This has been perfect. The size fits perfectly, and there is plenty of surface space to put platters or utensils. I know it's a potting table, but it works great in my space as a grill table. I did not bring it indoors last winter, and I see no wear or damage on it from surviving a MN winter.
customer_reviews.author: Smashed

customer_reviews.title: a 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a 5 star product. The bottom shelf height is adjustable for all your storing needs. It's sturdy and long enough to have the necessities to store two prepped pots to the left or right of the soil trap while potting your current plant and still have room for a small watering can. All the soil falls in between the slats into the black bag below. It's weather proof but I would still consider covering it to protect it from general wear and to preserve the longevity of the bench. It definitely adds a decorative look to any patio.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Russell

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product very easy to assemble(for a change) and appears to be as represented on the site. Only need a phillips head screwdriver to assemble and screws were already in place-just need tightening. Would have liked it to have holes for the screws instead of just holding shelves in place by tension. Overall, very sturdy(although a bit uneven). Could have been a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: cph

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for; assembled ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for; assembled within minutes. However, I can't figure out how to attach the bag. If the hooks are supposed to be inserted into the little holes at the end of each metal strip, they don't line up. I can't figure out how to do it any other way either. And...I can't find the "ask question" link, so hopefully someone will see this....
customer_reviews.author: R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: damaged and repackaged
customer_reviews.text: Had previously ordered (2) both were ok this time ordered (3) - each box had been opened and repackaged - had multiple layers of tape on the boxes each was damaged - the wood slats had been broken off - all parts were in the box - instead of returning have decided to repair myself as it is getting colder and need to get the greenhouse in order
customer_reviews.author: Darlene O.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something so I didn't have to re-pot my plants on the ground. This is a nice no frills potting stand. Doesn't take up much room if you have a small porch. Extra soil is caught in the bag. Wish it was a little taller for my old back. I will raise it up on a few bricks. Time will tell how weather proof it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mich123

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BENCH
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and looks great. Love the finish and very sturdy construction. Would recommend this bench to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Beermann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful potting bench
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful potting bench. It is exactly what I wanted. It is well made, easy to assemble, high quality and is absolutely perfect for my gardening purposes. The legs adjust so when you have it outside you can level it on uneven ground. It looks great, I get a lot of compliments on it. Functional, good looking, great price, sturdy & was delivered very quickly. If it looks good to you, buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vanderbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love my potting table!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted an area to do my potting and this is perfect-I'm able to keep all my tools there along with my bag of potting soil-I'm not 20 yrs old anymore so the height is great so I don't have to squat down and get back up doing my potting-
customer_reviews.author: janice d

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced and poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ok bench, wood slats are poor quality and this is way overpriced for what you get. Already rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Txgunnut45

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting perfection, but I have to admit that I wasn't expecting such poor craftsmanship either. The sloppy work translates into a very wobbly and rickety potting bench.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Arrived today, it was what I expected but was ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, it was what I expected but was missing a screw to attach to the legs. This necessitated a special trip to the hardware store to complete assembly. I'm subtracting one star for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for what I wanted it for!
customer_reviews.text: It was ok putting it together, the design could of been better. It was missing a screw.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Torres

customer_reviews.title: My vegetables are doing great this year
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my new greenhouse. Put one on each side with a large board spanning the end of the greenhouse. My vegetables are doing great this year. Much easier for an old lady to garden with buckets and pots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: the bucket works great for ice
customer_reviews.text: we use it for parties as a drink station; the bucket works great for ice, just keep it covered
customer_reviews.author: C. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install in no time. Just a screw driver! I set my top wood planks with a clear weather protector so it can last longer. Couldn't figure out the hole system for the rubbish baggy but it's hanging by two hooks instead of 4. Good luck. Fits our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamgirl787

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to assemble, perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. High quality and very easy to assemble. Size is perfect for a small place and the composite slat top looks very updated.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planting stand for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, compact, attractive, well designed potting stand. Fit perfectly into the small space I had. The merchant provided excellent description as well as a speedy delivery. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit shaky and flimsy, but then ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit shaky and flimsy, but then again, you get what you pay for. I really wish I chose a different one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great work bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is built well, very sturdy and a perfect size. For the price, I have found nothing that comes close to this for my garden prep area.
customer_reviews.author: DesertRat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for an outdoor grill station work table.
customer_reviews.author: lgal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good height
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and was easy to assemble. The bag didn't quite fit and really had to be stretched to attach. At little smaller than expected but a good height and works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sagebiel

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, attractive and well designed potting bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, attractive and well designed potting bench. Looks good enough to place alongside the visiting area of our patio. Functional, I find the bag refuse system to be quite handy. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Big Elk

customer_reviews.title: The table
customer_reviews.text: Great bench to start growing plants. Good height easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Use it outdoors for my plants and potting stuff. Sturdy and well made. Don't keep the bag attached, as it just seemed to collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice potting bench
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. Easy to out together, looks good, and a great price. Very happy with it, May buy a second for use as a small bench in my greenhouse
customer_reviews.author: kam

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for my needs.....before I ordered it, I had sent back a poorly constructed product (made in China} so I can tell you the construction and looks of your product are excellent! Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, no trouble getting them, good transaction. These are great but small'ish
customer_reviews.author: Mike Svoboda

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality sturdy attractive garden bench, would get a 2nd if I had room
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice place to do some prep work or hold plates while BBQ. I wish the legs were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Rohin Banerji

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday. He putters around on the patio with a few potted plants here and there and didn't need anything elaborate. This fits perfectly and looks nice on the patio without becoming an "eyesore" Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: CMS121

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to help with my garden needs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Fits well in a narrow patio and provides good, flexible work space
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Compact enough to sit right on my deck without taking up much room and looks nice too. Love the catch bag. Would have made the material for it something that drained better but it's easy to take out and empty.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L. Jackiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Needs correct hardwar
customer_reviews.text: This shelving required 8 screws to put it together, but only came with 3 of them. The 3 screws that were included were just thrown loose in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anne Allgood

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this potting bench. Would recommend. Great price. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness my husband is really handy and fixed everything quite easily but he shouldn't have to especially when it was ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was obviously a return as it was previously opened. The hooks for the bag were missing. A few of the slats needed to be glued and one of the screws was stripped. Thank goodness my husband is really handy and fixed everything quite easily but he shouldn't have to especially when it was given to him as a gift. It wasn't worth the hassle of a return so .......disappointed. If all were perfect it would still only be an "okay" product.
customer_reviews.author: Peewee92003

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed it for outside. Made a great extra food prep area next to my charcoal grill. Looks like it will stand up to the Maryland weather well. The packaging was pretty poor. Some parts of the unit rubbed through in shipment and had the finish knocked off. But it's going outside, so I wouldn't take a star off for that. Hopefully it will hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bench is beautiful as well as functional. Perfect for our greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya R Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by sturdy construction and very easy to put together. Good value for the price .
customer_reviews.author: MartinL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: Several of the wooden slats were not attached to the frame and fell to the floor when I pulled the item from the box. Disappointed with the flimsy construction. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine N

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Such a relief to not have to bend over to repot your plants. Lightweight enough to move around and can be taken apart for storage. The extra shelf is nice for holding pots.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Well built, easy to put together, perfect for my space. Wish I had found this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Walker

product_meta.title: Potting Bench - Weatherguard Garden and Greenhouse Workbench Portable Gardening Center - Features removable trimmings bin and adjustable shelf (39"W x 32"H x 15"D)
product_meta.description:
Weatherguard Garden and Greenhouse Potting Bench - Portable Gardening Station - Includes Rust Resistant Metal Frame, Composite Slats Top made from recycled material, Convenient Removable Trimmings Bin

This Potting Bench is perect for use inside your greenhouse as a potting workstation workbench and is lightweight enough to move around your garden or greenhouse. Vegetable and herb garden enthusiasts find it the perfect size for balcony gardens, patios, or porches. The adjustable bottom shelf can be positioned at any height for storing large bags of soil, tall plants or gardeing tools.

The main features of the potting bench include:

 * Easy One Tool Assembly - All you need is a screwdriver to assemble the metal frame. Composite slats are precut and drop into the frame. Bottom shelf slips onto frame and tightens with set screws.
 * Perfect Height for Working Standing Up - Enjoy gardening without the pain. This 32"" high potting bench is a comfortable workstation that saves you from bending and kneeling when repotting or trimming.
 * Lightweight But Sturdy - Move this potting bench around your garden or greenhouse with ease. The heavy duty metal frame and bottom shelf will support bags of potting soil, planters and small gardening hand tools.

This is the perfect potting bench for balconies or decks as well as greenhouses and gardens. It can double as an extended grilling prep area or backyard buffet with removable trash bin. The garden and greenhouse Composite Wood Top Potting Bench / Table is ideal for use as a workbench or for displaying plants. Easy, one-tool assembly gets you up and running in no time. The Decorative composite wood grain top, and all steel powder-coated frame makes this product a welcome addition to any garden or greenhouse.

About Weatherguard:

Find your perfect year round greenhouse and gardening accessories in Weatherguard, our line of roundtop greenhouses popular with both commercial and residential growers. The round design is ideal for areas that may receive light snowfall in the spring. We use triple layer polypropylene cover material and commercial grade, fully welded steel frame for maximum durability. Heavy duty zipper doors and side flaps give you extra dimensions of climate control.


WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Lead which is [are] known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
feature_bullets: EASY 1 TOOL ASSEMBLY - All you need is a screwdriver and approximately 30 minutes to be ready for gardening enjoyment.
STURDY YET LIGHTWEIGHT - This potting bench workstation has a heavy duty metal frame and composite slats made from recycled material. Can be moved around your garden or greenhouse with ease.
PERFECT HEIGHT AND SIZE - This potting bench is the perfect height for working comfortably while standing. Perfect for inside your greenhouse, balconies, patios, decks, porches, backyards.
ADJUSTABLE SHELF - The workbench bottom shelf can be placed at any height, lower for storing large bags of soil or supplies, higher to keep garden tools and smaller items within reach
HANDY TRIMMINGS BIN - Keep your potting and plant trimmimg mess to a minimum with the removable canvas bin. Conveniently sweep dirt and trimmings into the bag, remove and dispose - No mess!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
